title: Price drop: Generate images, text, logos and more with lifetime access to this AI platform
description: All-in-one platform gives businesses AI tools for writing, chatbots, and logo and art generation. Get a lifetime sub to AI MagicX for $99.99. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: All-in-one platform gives businesses AI tools for writing, chatbots, and logo and art generation. Get a lifetime sub to AI MagicX for $99.99.
text: Daily deals Fulfill all your AI needs with a single suite of AI tools, for a low one-time payment. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals With the wealth of AI tools available, the problem isn’t finding one that will get the job done. The real issue is finding the best fit for your budget. You might be able to find independent AI tools like ChatGPT or Dall-E for generating copy, creating logos, building stories and more, but AI MagicX does it all under one subscription, and you only have to pay for it once. That makes it a perfect suite of AI tools for business. This robust AI platform includes tools for designing logos, generating art, creating chatbots, writing articles and creating stories. There’s even a document editor. And for a limited time, you can get a lifetime subscription on sale for just $65 with code MAGIC35 (regularly $972). Why this instead of ChatGPT and Dall-E? Everyone’s into AI these days — even Apple. But not all AI tools deliver everything you need in one place, and certainly not for a single one-time payment. AI MagicX turns you into a creative team of one, with tools to streamline every aspect of the content-creation process. Business owners, you don’t need a massive team to create your brand identity, fill your landing pages with copy, and populate your site with eye-catching imagery. This AI tool can do it all! As with most AI tools, this AI MagicX subscription does not come with unlimited AI creations. However, you do get quite a lot every month. Your subscription includes: Unlimited MagicX words 250 MagicX images 250 MagicX logos 100 premium chatbot messages Create everything your business needs with these AI tools When you create content with AI MagicX, you can let your creativity take the lead, even if AI does all the work. When you generate images, you can select an image style and purpose, and provide a description of what you want to see. Similarly, you can guide the logo design process by providing a description, selecting a similar logo style and providing a color palette. With your lifetime subscription, you can access AI MagicX on up to 999 devices. That means individuals can use it on all their personal devices. And business owners can share these AI tools across their organization. All you need to access your AI toolset is any modern browser on mobile or desktop. Updates are included. Pay once for a suite of AI tools for business owners and individuals Consolidate your AI tools into one platform. Get a lifetime subscription to AI MagicX for $65 with code MAGIC35 (regularly $972). It’s a fantastic group of AI tools for business owners as well as individuals. And you get a commercial license for your AI creations. Price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on February 9, 2025. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deal on AI MagicX tools for business on July 17, 2024.
html:
• Daily deals

With the wealth of AI tools available, the problem isn’t finding one that will get the job done. The real issue is finding the best fit for your budget. You might be able to find independent AI tools like ChatGPT or Dall-E for generating copy, creating logos, building stories and more, but AI MagicX does it all under one subscription, and you only have to pay for it once. That makes it a perfect suite of AI tools for business.

This robust AI platform includes tools for designing logos, generating art, creating chatbots, writing articles and creating stories. There’s even a document editor. And for a limited time, you can get a lifetime subscription on sale for just $65 with code MAGIC35 (regularly $972).

Why this instead of ChatGPT and Dall-E?

Everyone’s into AI these days — even Apple. But not all AI tools deliver everything you need in one place, and certainly not for a single one-time payment. AI MagicX turns you into a creative team of one, with tools to streamline every aspect of the content-creation process. Business owners, you don’t need a massive team to create your brand identity, fill your landing pages with copy, and populate your site with eye-catching imagery. This AI tool can do it all!

As with most AI tools, this AI MagicX subscription does not come with unlimited AI creations. However, you do get quite a lot every month. Your subscription includes:

  • Unlimited MagicX words
  • 250 MagicX images
  • 250 MagicX logos
  • 100 premium chatbot messages

Create everything your business needs with these AI tools

When you create content with AI MagicX, you can let your creativity take the lead, even if AI does all the work. When you generate images, you can select an image style and purpose, and provide a description of what you want to see. Similarly, you can guide the logo design process by providing a description, selecting a similar logo style and providing a color palette.

With your lifetime subscription, you can access AI MagicX on up to 999 devices. That means individuals can use it on all their personal devices. And business owners can share these AI tools across their organization. All you need to access your AI toolset is any modern browser on mobile or desktop. Updates are included.

Pay once for a suite of AI tools for business owners and individuals

Consolidate your AI tools into one platform. Get a lifetime subscription to AI MagicX for $65 with code MAGIC35 (regularly $972). It’s a fantastic group of AI tools for business owners as well as individuals. And you get a commercial license for your AI creations.

Price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on February 9, 2025.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deal on AI MagicX tools for business on July 17, 2024.
